cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)
project(ogdf-user-example CXX)

set(OGDF_CONFIG_SEARCH_PATH CACHE PATH "")

find_package(OGDF CONFIG PATHS ${OGDF_CONFIG_SEARCH_PATH})
if(NOT OGDF_FOUND)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "No OGDF configuration for CMake has been found. "
    "Please set OGDF_CONFIG_SEARCH_PATH such that ogdf-config.cmake (generated by your OGDF build) can be found.")
endif()

add_executable(check-build-mode check-build-mode.cpp)
target_include_directories(check-build-mode PRIVATE ${OGDF_INCLUDE_DIRS})
target_link_libraries(check-build-mode OGDF)
